Welcome.Summary: Check the Summary tab for your combat dashboard
Welcome.Title: SWSE Enhanced System Loaded!

Advancement.Hint: Configure level-up, talents, feats, and progression options
Advancement.Label: 設定
Advancement.Name: Advancement Rules

ArmoredDefenseForAll.Hint: All characters can use armor bonus to Reflex Defense
ArmoredDefenseForAll.Name: Armored Defense for All

AthleticsConsolidation.Hint: Merge Climb, Jump, and Swim into single Athletics skill
AthleticsConsolidation.Name: Athletics Skill

AutoConditionRecovery.Hint: Prompt for condition track recovery checks at the start of each combatant's turn
AutoConditionRecovery.Name: Automatic Condition Recovery

AutoDamageThreshold.Hint: Automatically move characters down the condition track when damage exceeds their damage threshold
AutoDamageThreshold.Name: Automatic Damage Threshold

CharacterCreation.Hint: Configure ability score generation, HP, and character creation options
CharacterCreation.Label: 設定
CharacterCreation.Name: Character Creation Rules

Combat.Hint: Configure combat, damage, death, and condition track rules
Combat.Label: 設定
Combat.Name: Combat Rules

ConditionTrackCap.Hint: Maximum condition track steps from single attack
ConditionTrackCap.Name: Condition Track Damage Cap

CrossClassSkills.Hint: Allow training non-class skills for 2 skill slots
CrossClassSkills.Name: Cross-Class Skill Training

DailyForcePoints.Hint: Use daily Force Points instead of per-level (1-5th: 1 FP, 6-10th: 2 FP, 11-15th: 3 FP, 16+: 4 FP per day)
DailyForcePoints.Name: Daily Force Points

DarkSideTemptation.Hint: Spend Force Point to temporarily gain Dark Side powers
DarkSideTemptation.Name: Dark Side Temptation

DarkSideTemptationMechanic.Hint: Allow characters to call upon the Dark Side when spending Force Points (requires Dark Side Score ≤ half Wisdom, adds +1d6, increases Dark Side Score by 1)
DarkSideTemptationMechanic.Name: Dark Side Temptation Mechanic

DevMode.Hint: Enable detailed error logging and stack traces for debugging
DevMode.Name: Developer Mode

DiagonalMovement.Hint: How to count diagonal movement on grid
DiagonalMovement.Name: Diagonal Movement

EnableAutomation.Hint: Automatically track combat rounds, turns, and apply combat effects
EnableAutomation.Name: Enable Combat Automation

Force.Hint: Configure Force Points, Dark Side, and Force power rules
Force.Label: 設定
Force.Name: Force & Destiny Rules

ForcePointBonus.Hint: Bonus die size when spending Force Points to reroll (d6 = +1d6)
ForcePointBonus.Name: Force Point Reroll Bonus

Presets.Hint: Apply preset houserule configurations or import/export settings
Presets.Label: プリセット管理
Presets.Name: Houserule Presets

ResetResourcesOnCombat.Hint: Automatically reset temporary resources (like Second Wind) when combat begins
ResetResourcesOnCombat.Name: Reset Resources on Combat Start

SecondWindImproved.Hint: Second Wind also improves condition track by one step
SecondWindImproved.Name: Improved Second Wind

SkillFocusRestriction.Hint: Restrict Skill Focus (Use the Force) to prevent early game dominance
SkillFocusRestriction.Name: Skill Focus Restrictions

StoreDiscount.Hint: Percentage of original price when selling items to the store
StoreDiscount.Name: Store Sell Discount

StoreMarkup.Hint: Percentage markup for items purchased from the store (can be negative for discounts)
StoreMarkup.Name: Store Price Markup

TalentEveryLevel.Hint: Characters gain a talent at every level instead of every odd level
TalentEveryLevel.Name: Talent Every Level

WeaponRangeMultiplier.Hint: Multiply all weapon ranges by this factor (useful for different scale grids)
WeaponRangeMultiplier.Name: Weapon Range Multiplier

WeaponRanges.Hint: Multiply all weapon ranges by this factor
WeaponRanges.Name: Weapon Range Modifier

WelcomeShown.Hint: Tracks if the welcome message has been displayed
WelcomeShown.Name: Welcome Message Shown
